apis.name: Invite by email to group or project
apis.description: Invites a new user by email to join a group or project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project or group owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: email
attributes.description: The email of the new member or multiple emails separated by commas

attributes.name: expires_at
attributes.description: A date string in the format YEAR-MONTH-DAY

attributes.name: invite_source
attributes.description: The source of the invitation that starts the member creation process. See this issue.

attributes.name: tasks_to_be_done
attributes.description: Tasks the inviter wants the member to focus on. The tasks are added as issues to a specified project. The possible values are: ci, code and issues. If specified, requires tasks_project_id. Introduced in GitLab 14.6

attributes.name: tasks_project_id
attributes.description: The project ID in which to create the task issues. If specified, requires tasks_to_be_done. Introduced in GitLab 14.6

message.test@example.com: Invite email has already been taken

apis.name: List all invitations pending for a group or project
apis.description: Gets a list of invited group or project members viewable by the authenticated user. Returns invitations to direct members only, and not through inherited ancestors’ groups.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project or group owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: per_page
attributes.description: Number of member invitations to return per page

attributes.name: query
attributes.description: A query string to search for invited members by invite email. Query text must match email address exactly. When empty, returns all invitations.

apis.name: Update an invitation to a group or project
apis.description: Updates a pending invitation’s access level or access expiry date.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project or group owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: email
attributes.description: The email address to which the invitation was previously sent.

attributes.name: access_level
attributes.description: A valid access level (defaults: 30, the Developer role).

attributes.name: expires_at
attributes.description: A date string in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).

apis.name: Delete an invitation to a group or project
apis.description: Deletes a pending invitation by email address.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project or group owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: email
attributes.description: The email address to which the invitation was previously sent
